description:
Description
List of all courses at UCLA during Fall 2018.
title: UCLA courses in Fall 2018

parameters.ind_study: Boolean for if this is some form of independent  study
parameters.seminar: Boolean for if this is a seminar course
parameters.subject: Subject
parameters.special_topic: Boolean for if this is any of the special types of courses listed
parameters.laboratory: Boolean for if this is a lab
parameters.apprenticeship: Boolean for if this is an apprenticeship
parameters.honors_contracts: Boolean for if this is an honors contracts course
parameters.internship: Boolean for if this is an internship

format: A data frame with 3950 observations on the following 14 variables.
